text: General Sunith Francis Rodrigues, PVSM, VSM (19 September 1933 - 4 March 2022) was an Indian army officer and politician. He was Chief of the Army Staff of the Indian Army from 1990 to 1993 and Governor of Punjab from 2004 to 2010. Rodrigues died on 4 March 2022 in Panaji, Goa, India at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Governors of Punjab, India Category:Indian military people Category:Administrators of Chandigarh
title: Sunith Francis Rodrigues
